# Canid
The Canid (Cay-Nid) are similar to Felinids, except a hydrid of dog traits on a human frame. Hailing from a colony of genetic engineers, the species has become distinct enough to be classed by itself.
## Diet
- Can eat raw meat. - Will get poisoned by Theobromine (Chocolate, Tea, Coffee) and Allicin (Onion, Garlic).
## Benefits
- Slightly smaller than humans on average, and slightly harder to hit because of that. - Hardened stomachs make them more 20% more resistant to poisoning. - Due to extensive gene tailoring their cells wound up 15% more resiliant to ionizing radiation. - Can use their hightened olfactory senses to track scents.
## Drawbacks
- They take increased 20% slash, blunt, and heat damage. - Colorblind by nature, though different eyes can offset this. - Slightly lower stamina than other species.
